COMMENT_TX: $Roger Clemens left with tight right hamstring
$the ball landed on the line next to 3B umpire Rick Reed, who signaled foul; he was overruled immediately by LF umpire Ed Rapuano
$David Justice called for interference for running in fair territory
$start of game delayed by speech by President George Bush
$the ball bounced into the stands behind 3B
$the ball was foul and took a strange bounce into fair territory past Jason Giambi
$Jermaine Dye fouled ball off his leg and broke a bone; he was carried off the field
$Ramon Hernandez left with sprained right wrist
$Derek Jeter fell into the seats as he caught the ball; Eric Chavez was awarded 2B because Jeter carried the ball out of play
